Topic.Title: The road to Hollywood - first game

Posts.EditableText: I hope some of you will try my first game. It's a multiply choice sim. The road to Hollywood: Do you have what it takes to become the next big thing! Choose your path wisely as there are many options that will cut your road to fame short. http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... -hollywood
